title: Blinker's spy-spotter
creator_credit: Children's Film Foundation, Eyeline Films, Harold Orton and Jack Stephens
brief_description: The story of young “Blinker” (a professor’s son) who loves gadgets of all kinds. Blinker and his frinds thwart an attempt by a rival gang of boys to steal a top secret invention of the professor’s.
creator_credit_for_label: Children’s Film Foundation, Eyeline Films, Harold Orton and Jack Stephens
